name: Optimize Windows Performance
description: Applies general Windows optimizations to improve speed and responsiveness.

name: Improve Windows Privacy
description: Disables telemetry, advertising, and location tracking features to enhance privacy.

name: Disable Windows Telemetry
description: Blocks the core telemetry services that send data to Microsoft servers.

name: Disable App Diagnostics & Telemetry
description: Prevents apps from collecting and transmitting diagnostic data.

name: Turn Off Sync Features
description: Stops syncing settings, themes, passwords, and data across Microsoft devices.

name: Disable Customer Experience Program
description: Opt out of Microsoftâ€™s data collection for customer experience improvement.

name: Turn Off Windows Feedback
description: Disables the Windows Feedback prompts and background telemetry.

name: Disable Office Data Collection
description: Prevents Microsoft Office from sending usage and diagnostic data.

name: Disable Background Apps
description: Prevents apps from running in the background to save resources.

name: Disable Extra Diagnostic Services
description: Disables redundant diagnostic services not essential to system stability.

name: Prevent Preinstalled App Reinstallation
description: Stops automatic reinstallation of default Windows apps after updates.

name: Disable Diagnostic Services
description: Terminates telemetry-related services to reduce background activity.

name: Disable Printing & Maps Services
description: Disables unnecessary print spooler and maps-related services.

name: Disable Bluetooth Services
description: Turns off Bluetooth-related services if not needed.

name: Turn Off SmartScreen
description: Disables SmartScreen filter to reduce background activity and popups.

name: File Explorer Tweaks
description: Applies UI and performance tweaks to File Explorer.

name: Windows System Tweaks
description: Enables minor system-wide improvements for usability and performance.

name: Advanced Tweaks
description: Applies deeper system changes for performance gains.

name: Reduce Menu Delay
description: Speeds up UI responsiveness by reducing menu animation delay.

name: Disable Ads & Popups
description: Removes Windows tips, ads, and suggestions from the UI.

name: Disable Cortana
description: Completely disables the Cortana assistant and related background processes.

name: Turn Off Error Reporting
description: Prevents Windows from sending error reports to Microsoft.

name: Enable Game Mode
description: Activates Windows Game Mode to prioritize game performance.

name: Log Only Critical Errors
description: Limits event logging to critical errors only, reducing log overhead.

name: Disable Fault Tolerant Heap
description: Turns off the Fault Tolerant Heap for better performance in legacy apps.

name: Fully Reset Network Settings
description: Resets all network settings including adapters, DNS, and firewalls.

name: Optimize Network Adapter
description: Tweak network adapter settings for lower latency and better throughput.

name: Enable Direct Cache Access
description: Allows direct memory access from network buffers for faster data transfer.

name: Enable MSI Mode
description: Enables Message Signaled Interrupts for network cards to reduce CPU load.

name: Set DNS Priority
description: Optimizes DNS resolution order for faster domain lookup.

name: Disable NetBIOS over TCP/IP
description: Shuts off outdated NetBIOS protocol to reduce attack surface and latency.

name: Disable Hidden Power Saving Features
description: Disables unseen NIC power-saving features to maintain stable speeds.

name: Turn Off Network Limiting
description: Removes limitations on bandwidth for system-reserved traffic.

name: Disable Nagle's Algorithm
description: Improves TCP latency for real-time applications by disabling packet buffering.

name: Network Throttling Index
description: Adjusts registry to eliminate artificial limits on multimedia throughput.

name: Enable Onboard Network Processor
description: Offloads network processing to hardware to reduce CPU usage.

name: Optimize Lanman Server
description: Improves SMB server performance for file sharing and networking.

name: Advanced Network Tweaks
description: Enables several advanced registry and driver-level network optimizations.

name: Set Network Adapter Core Priority
description: Binds network processing to dedicated CPU cores for better performance.

name: Registry Tweaks
description: Applies system-level registry changes for network optimization.

name: High Performance Power Plan
description: Enables Windows High Performance power plan for consistent CPU clock speeds.

name: Ultimate Performance Power Plan
description: Activates the hidden Ultimate Performance power plan for workstation-level speed.

name: Disable Power Saving on USB Devices
description: Prevents USB devices from sleeping to ensure better stability and performance.

name: Disable Processor Throttling
description: Prevents CPU from reducing speed under load for maximum performance.

name: Disable Link State Power Management
description: Reduces latency by disabling PCI Express power-saving features.

name: Disable Selective Suspend
description: Prevents USB suspension to avoid stutter and input lag.

name: Disable Idle Hard Disk Timeout
description: Keeps hard disks active to reduce spin-up delays.

name: Enable High Precision Event Timer
description: Improves input response and timing precision by enabling HPET.

name: Disable Dynamic Ticks
description: Improves real-time latency by disabling idle CPU timer coalescing.

name: Disable Timer Coalescing
description: Improves input latency by forcing consistent timer interrupts.

name: Set Low Latency Scheduling
description: Adjusts system scheduling to favor low-latency responsiveness.

name: Enable MSI Mode for GPU and Audio
description: Lowers input and sound latency by enabling interrupt message mode.
